info.name: ce_api_server
info.description: Kinetic Request CE API Web Application

info.name: ce_api_username
info.description: CE Name of user account that has permission to use the API

info.name: ce_api_password
info.description: CE Password for the API user

info.name: ars_server
info.description: The ARS API application, if running task locally could be http://localhost:8008/

info.name: ars_username
info.description: ARS Name of user account that has permission to use the API

info.name: ars_password
info.description: ARS Password for the API user

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
